sentences.en: Every sort of spring has a definite elasticity.
sentences.cn: 每一种弹簧都有一定的弹性.

sentences.en: Fix a definite date for the delivery of your computer.
sentences.cn: 请为你的电脑定个确切的交货日期。

sentences.en: He hemmed and hawed but wouldn't say anything definite.
sentences.cn: 他总是哼儿哈儿的,就是不说句痛快话.

sentences.en: He’d shown definite signs of resigning himself to the situation.
sentences.cn: 他明显表现出安于这种状况的样子。

sentences.en: Her Royal Highness has definite views about most things.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下对大多数事情都有明确的观点。

sentences.en: In a double-blind trial, there were definite improvements.
sentences.cn: 在双盲试验中，改善效果明显。

sentences.en: It's definite that he will come to help us.
It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer.
sentences.cn: 我不可能给你明确的答复。

sentences.en: Let's feel out the situation first before we take any definite steps.
sentences.cn: 我们先把情况摸清楚,再采取具体措施.

sentences.en: Let's make it definite -- we'll meet at 6 o'clock.
sentences.cn: 咱们 说 死了,6点钟见面.

sentences.en: Mary is very definite about this.
She has certain definite beauties, such as her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她确有几分姿色, 比如说她的眼睛.

sentences.en: The doctor is quite definite about Tom having measles.
sentences.cn: 医生十分肯定汤姆得了麻疹.

sentences.en: There has already been a definite improvement.
We had no trouble finding your house because your directions were definite.
sentences.cn: 我们很容易找到你的家,因为你的地址说得很清楚.

sentences.en: We need to record sufficient data to enable definite conclusions to be reached.
sentences.cn: 我们需要记录足够的数据，才能得出明确的结论。

sentences.en: When you came away you made a definite effort to mix.
sentences.cn: 你离开时一定要努力和大家搞好关系。

words.tran_cn: 可下定义的；可确定的；可限定的
有定义的，确定的；清晰的，轮廓分明的
最典型的；起决定性作用的
决定性的；最后的；限定的
清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地
确定性，定指；明确；清晰度；梅性
定义；[物] 清晰度；解说
使明确；给...下定义；使...的轮廓分明（define的过去分词）
规定（define的ing形式）；给…下定义；表明特征

trans.tran_cn: 不会改变的，明确的，(证据或信息)确凿的
